title: Remove selected principal display element from the header

requirements.text: Remove the selected header element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1] entirely, and let the surrounding header layout collapse naturally (no reserved space). The removal must be permanent for all users (no conditional rendering to show it in any state).
acceptanceCriteria: The UI element corresponding to XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1] is removed from the rendered header DOM in all authentication/role states.
After removal, the header layout reflows naturally with no empty gap where the element used to be (spacing between remaining header items is visually correct on both desktop and mobile breakpoints).
No other header elements outside the selected element are removed or redesigned as part of this change.

constraints: Apply the change ONLY to the selected element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1].
Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Implementing or changing an admin-role system for the provided principal.
Changing how principals are formatted or displayed elsewhere in the app (e.g., dialogs or profile pages).
Any backend changes (data model, authorization, persistence).
